name: You Are a Ghost
description:
You Are a Ghost is a point and click narrative game that uses fun and bright aesthetics to help the player digest a very depressing and realistic story. 

Dive into the lives of this mundane family and help them tackle their greatest fears, issues, and insecurities.

How to Play:

Use your Mouse to explore the house and move around, click on any objects to interact with them. 

Team

Citlalli Hernandez: Programming

Emery Plyler: Art, Animations, Music

Naomi Fonken: Production, Programming, Animation

Patrick Queiroz: Production, Narrative, SFX

CONTENT WARNING: Death, depression, loss of a child.
